text:
Champions League
PSG-Bruges streaming: where to see the match?
Paris Saint-Germain host Brugge on behalf of the fourth day of the Champions League. A meeting broadcast live on RMC Sport 1 from 21:00 this Wednesday, November 6, 2019, but also to follow live streaming on PC, Mac, iPhone, iPad and Android.
06 Nov 2019, 06:15 by Florian Sermaise



This is the moment for Paris Saint-Germain. On the occasion of the fourth day of Group A Champions League, the club has the opportunity to transform the test and validate its qualification for the round of 16. Consequence of a perfect course so far. After his demonstration of entry against Real Madrid (3-0) and his victory in Galatasaray (1-0), Kylian Mbapp√© and his team beat Brugge in Belgium (5-0). Three games, 9 points, 9 goals scored and 0 conceded. Hard to beat when it comes to finding the leader of Jupiler Pro League at Parc des Princes. The latter also plays big in the Paris area. Third in the pool with two points on the clock, Krepin Diatta and his partners could see their future darkened in case of defeat.








The schedule of group A




Kylian Mbapp√© + 18 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

1st day - 18 September:

18h55: Club Brugge 0-0 Galatasaray
9 pm: PSG 3-0 Real Madrid

2nd day - 1st of October:

18h55: Real Madrid 2-2 Club Brugge
9 pm: Galatasaray 0-1 PSG

3rd day - 22nd of October:

9 pm: Club Bruges 0-5 PSG
9 pm: Galatasaray 0-1 Real Madrid

4th day - November 6th:

9 pm: Real Madrid - Galatasaray
9 pm: PSG - Club Brugge

5th day - November 26th:

18h55: Galatasaray - Club Brugge
9 pm: Real Madrid - PSG

6th day - December 11th:

9 pm: Club Brugge - Real Madrid
9 pm: PSG - Galatasaray

The classification of group A




Angel Di Maria + 18 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport



Paris - 9 points (+9)
Real Madrid - 4 pts (-2)
FC Bruges - 2 pts (-5)
Galatasaray - 1 pt (-2)

The first two are qualified in the 8th finals. The third is donated to the Europa League. The last leaves the European Cup for this season.
PSG-Bruges streaming




Team Brugge + 18 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

This meeting between Paris Sint-Germain and Brugge FC will be broadcast on Wednesday November 6th on RMC Sport 1 from 9 pm French time. A channel accessible by subscription to a limited number of audiovisual actors. Mainly SFR and Canal +. As a result, you can not access it via your Internet operator for example, there is an alternative solution: the 100% digital offer of RMC Sport (or OTT). A subscription available at a price of 9 euros per month for mobile or fixed subscribers of SFR, 19 euros per month with commitment / 25 euros per month without commitment for non-subscribers.
Discover below the list of supports to watch RMC Sport streaming:


iPhone, iPad, iPod Touch


Android


PC / Mac via Internet browser type Chrome, Safari, Microsoft Edge

Chromecast, Apple TV, Samsung Smart TV, Nvidia Shield, Philips with Connect TV option



Photo Albums
